features: 2 Light Wings 120mm PWM high-speed fans offer equally high air pressure and vibrant ARGB illumination
Doubly decoupled PWM pump for quiet operation and minimal vibration

body.description: Pure Loop 2 FX 240mm is the very high-performing and silent All-in-One water cooling unit with impressive ARGB illumination. • Very high cooling performance for all mainstream CPUs • 2 Light Wings 120mm PWM high-speed fans offer equally high air pressure and vibrant ARGB illumination • Doubly decoupled PWM pump for quiet operation and minimal vibration • ARGB-PWM-Hub enables synchronization of up to 6 ARGB components and PWM fans • Combination of ARGB illumination, all-black design and aluminum-style for unmistakable and stylish look • Easy-to-access refill port and included coolant bottle for a long lifespan

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Reliable Cooling Power for Sophisticated Applications Impressively High Cooling Performance With Pure Loop 2 FX 240mm even demanding applications can be used reliably. A very high cooling power provides low temperatures even during periods of peak CPU performance. Pure Loop 2 FX 240mm is the water cooling solution of choice for all mainstream CPUs. Fans Developed for Radiators With a remarkably high air pressure of up to 2.6mm /H2O, Light Wings 120mm PWM high-speed is the best choice for Pure Loop 2 FX 240mm. The 9 airflow-optimized fan blades provide enough air pressure to make this fan perfect, even in demanding configurations. Impressive Illumination, Neat Design 2 Light Wings PWM high-speed offer ARGB lighting at the front and rear. 18 ARGB LEDs give you many opportunities to individualize your PC build. This and the illuminated cooling block make Pure Loop 2 FX 240mm a highlight in any system.

Adjustable and Silent Operation Doubly Decoupled PWM-Pump The doubly decoupled PWM-pump runs smoothly and silent. Due to the PWM control the pump speed can be adjusted for silent as well as powerful operations. Thanks to the effective damping the pump causes even less noise and minimal vibration. This is the key to provide the well-known silent be quiet! operation. One Hub, many Possibilities The ARGB-PWM-Hub enables synchronization of up to 6 PWM fans and 6 ARGB components. This allows the user to run all your cooling and lighting gear with just one PWM and one ARGB header on your motherboard. It can be positioned everywhere inside the case and by that supports a neat interior and cable management. Easy to refill The refill port is easy to access which makes refilling safe and comfortable. The coolant bottle included in scope of delivery makes it easy to achieve a long lifespan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great! But complex cable management
reviews.reviewText: Works awesome! Just a tiny bit more loud when idle compared to their air coolers BUT it's a lot more quiet than air cooling when the CPU is under full load! Assuming you set the curves right. I'm using it with 7950x3d. No complaints so far. I absolutely love Be Quiet for their engineering and how quiet their devices areBe aware of the complex cable management. There are A LOT of cables: one for each motor and one for each LED. If you don't wanna deal with it, get something simpler! Also you have to squeeze the hub somewhere. Make sure your case was made with cable management in mind! Otherwise you'll have bad time. I have Lancool III and it works great, tho I still had to be creative. But it took us a while to get it all beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best AIO's you can buy!
reviews.reviewText: be quiet! Pure Loop 2 FX 360mm: Powerful Cooling, Quiet Confidence (with a Few Quirks)Overall Rating: 4.5 out of 5 starsFor: Gamers, overclockers, noise-conscious users, high-performance PCsAgainst: Pricey, bulky for some cases, lack of RGB (if you're into that)Cooling Performance: 5 out of 5 starsThe Pure Loop 2 FX 360mm lives up to its name, keeping my overclocked Intel i9-12900K cool and calm even under heavy workloads. The large 360mm radiator and powerful Silent Wings 3 fans efficiently dissipate heat, resulting in impressive temperature drops compared to air coolers. I saw temperatures stay well below thermal throttling even during intense gaming sessions and benchmarks.Noise Level: 5 out of 5 starsThis is where the "be quiet!" part truly shines. The Pure Loop 2 FX runs incredibly quiet, even at full speed. The Silent Wings 3 fans generate minimal noise, making it virtually inaudible during everyday tasks and surprisingly quiet even during gaming. This is a huge plus for noise-sensitive users and those looking for a peaceful computing experience.Build Quality and Design: 4.5 out of 5 starsThe Pure Loop 2 FX feels premium throughout. The aluminum radiator is solid and well-built, and the hoses are flexible yet durable. The pump also features a sleek LED ring that offers a subtle glow (though no full RGB if you're into that). Installation was straightforward thanks to the included pre-applied thermal paste and clear instructions. The only minor gripe is the size – the 360mm radiator might not fit all cases, so be sure to check compatibility before purchase.Value: 4 out of 5 starsThe Pure Loop 2 FX comes at a premium price, which might be a sticking point for budget-conscious builders. However, its exceptional cooling performance, quiet operation, and premium build quality justify the cost for users who prioritize top-notch thermal management and a tranquil computing environment.Things to Consider:Size: As mentioned, the 360mm radiator might not fit all cases. Check compatibility before buying.Price: This is a high-end cooler with a high-end price tag. Consider your budget carefully.No RGB: If you're into flashy builds with lots of RGB lighting, this cooler might not be for you.Final Verdict:The be quiet! Pure Loop 2 FX 360mm is a top-tier CPU liquid cooler that delivers unbeatable cooling performance with incredibly low noise levels. Its premium build quality and ease of installation make it a compelling choice for gamers, overclockers, and anyone who demands the best for their high-performance PC. While the price and size might be dealbreakers for some, the unparalleled cooling and quiet operation make it a worthy investment for those who prioritize thermal excellence and a serene computing experience.Note:This review is based on my own experience using the be quiet! Pure Loop 2 FX 360mm for several weeks. Your results may vary.Feel free to adapt and personalize this review to your own experience and preferences. You can add specific details about your build, temperature benchmarks, or personal pros and cons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a dream! Keeps my 12th gen i9 at 30!!
reviews.reviewText: This thing works like a dream I upgraded from an i5 and went to the i9 since Amazon also had that on sale for 300 bucks! Yes please!! Not the easiest thing to install but manageable if you know something about computers and it looks insanely nice and super quiet! Love it!

reviews.reviewText: This is just awesome. Love it. My first watercooler.My first PC built. Straightforward. Cooling so far great.

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product, bad instructions.
reviews.reviewText: Very unclear on how to setup, caused overheating and lot of trial and error... Once working is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well with Core i5 13600K
reviews.reviewText: As expected, this cooler runs super quiet. I don't hear it until I start to push the processor with something like gaming or Photoshop. And even then, it's the gentle sound of air moving with very little perceivable fan noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Build quality is dead-on. The unit functions as advertised and reviewed. RGB fans are gorgeous and exist on the AIO as a great feature. The one shortcoming of the entire build is a lack of hardened steel screws,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Es muyyyy potente, refrigera sin dudarlo. simplemente fantastico.

The be quiet! Pure Loop 2 FX 280mm is a testament to convenience and cooling prowess. Installation was a breeze, even for a novice. The cooling effect is immediately noticeable, maintaining optimal temperatures even under load. A word to the wise – keep the pump speed on the lower side for a truly quiet experience. This cooler strikes an impressive balance between performance and silence, making it a valuable addition to any build. Highly recommended for those who value a tranquil and cool computing environment.

reviews.reviewTitle: El mejor AIO para el Ryzen 9 7950X
reviews.reviewText: Es un de los pocos sistemas de enfriamiento que puede mantener el 7950x por debajo de 95°c, puede mantener todos los núcleos a 5.2Ghz en tareas de renderizado, la temperatura nunca paso de 91°c y en juegos no pasan de 56°c, la temperaturas en reposo son de 45~48°c.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great aio - with a catch for Y60 owners.
reviews.reviewText: Picked this up to replace a cheap AiO I had bought in a pinch, I've been running this for a day now, and my initial impression so far is great! Installed easily, the quality feels great, plus I really like the design of the Be Quite! Lightwings, and like the name, it's quiet so far. CPU idles in the low 30s, under load rarely breaks over 55, on a 11900k, temps could certainly be a bit higher on new CPUs however.One Caveat for people who use a Y60. The fill port screw on the radiator will press against the radiator bracket on the Hyte, not allowing you to fully screw down the fan situated on that side. I ended up using a pair of tin snips I had to cut out a small square indent to allow the screw to fit, so everything was flush. While an easy fix, still a bit of an annoyance.Overall, great product by a great brand.
Tout reste au frais et pas trop et plutôt silencieux , niquel

Muy buena ventilación para un Ryzen 7950X, temperaturas idle 45ºC, le he sacado mucho provecho al Hub para coordinar el RGB de los ventiladores y otros componentes. No me ha gustado que la posición de la bomba de agua.
